usage: gym exercise, toning and sculpting arms, shoulders and back
key_features: Hexagonal shape for easy stacking and roll-free use
Neoprene coating for durability and protection
Thick coating for comfortable and non-slip feel
Precision hex shape for enhanced ground stability
ai_description: A pair of vibrant pink hexagonal dumbbells with the KAKSS brand and 2 KG weight clearly printed in white on the ends. The dumbbells feature a thick, textured neoprene coating that provides a comfortable, non-slip grip. Their hexagonal design prevents rolling during floor exercises and allows for stable stacking. The product appears new and is presented against a clean white background, showcasing the bright pink color and professional finish.
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
